metadata.synopsis: A one-liner dialog for a redcap who works as a cleaner in the circus. There are a total of two of them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book, act 3, wrym's crossing, circus of the last days. You'll find the redcaps wandering around the circus.

0.speaker: Fred
0.text: BAH! Scummy ballbag - move! I GOTS TO CLEAN.
0.context: NodeContext: hates cleaning and is pissed he has to do it

1.speaker: Fred
1.context: NodeContext: hates cleaning and is pissed he has to do it
